mapper.sql: ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, CREATE_TIME as createTime, USER_ID as userId, PHONE as phone, PWD as pwd, GESTURE_PWD as gesturePwd, ACCOUNT_STATUS as accountStatus, IMG_URL as imgUrl, NICKNAME as nickname, LOGIN_FAIL_CNT as loginFailCnt, LOGIN_FAIL_TIME as loginFailTime, REMARK as remark, GESTURE_FAIL_CNT as gestureFailCnt, GESTURE_FAIL_TIME as gestureFailTime, OPEN_SYS_MSG as openSysMsg, OPEN_SYS_MSG_TIME as openSysMsgTime, OPEN_ELE_BILL as openEleBill, SOURCE as source, OPEN_ELE_BILL_TIME as openEleBillTime, TOTAL_EARNINGS as totalEarnings, PAY_PWD as payPwd
mapper.insert: insert into drt_account (ACCOUNT_ID, CREATE_TIME, USER_ID, PHONE, PWD, GESTURE_PWD, ACCOUNT_STATUS, IMG_URL, NICKNAME, LOGIN_FAIL_CNT, LOGIN_FAIL_TIME, REMARK, GESTURE_FAIL_CNT, GESTURE_FAIL_TIME, OPEN_SYS_MSG, OPEN_SYS_MSG_TIME, OPEN_ELE_BILL, SOURCE, OPEN_ELE_BILL_TIME, TOTAL_EARNINGS, PAY_PWD) values (#{accountId}, #{createTime}, #{userId}, #{phone}, #{pwd}, #{gesturePwd}, #{accountStatus}, #{imgUrl}, #{nickname}, #{loginFailCnt}, #{loginFailTime}, #{remark}, #{gestureFailCnt}, #{gestureFailTime}, #{openSysMsg}, #{openSysMsgTime}, #{openEleBill}, #{source}, #{openEleBillTime}, #{totalEarnings}, #{payPwd})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM drt_account WHERE create_time >= DATE_SUB(DATE(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND DATE(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) > create_time GROUP BY account_id
